item.title: Scroll to offset with scroll-margin-top
item.description: TIL there are some CSS properties that you can set to adjust where a browser scrolls to when scrolling to a div without ruining the perfect spacing of your page! Just add: .my-element { scroll-margin-top: 60px; } And then this will scroll to 60px above the element: document.querySelector(".my-element") .scrollIntoView({ block: "start" })
